description: Try our easy to follow Vegetable Korma With Tomato & Cumin Dal recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Curry,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Halal,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Peanut free
name: Vegetable Korma With Tomato & Cumin Dal Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 pkt Passage To India Korma Curry Paste
1 pkt Passage To India Dalicious Tomato, Cumin & Lentil Dal
1 brown onion, halved and thinly sliced
600g white washed potatoes, peeled, cut into 3cm pieces
1 cup basmati rice, rinsed and drained

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in a large saucepan over mediumhigh heat. Add onion and cook, stirring, for 3 minutes or until onion softens. Add curry paste and coconut milk, then stir to combine. Add potato and 3/4 cup water. Reduce heat to medium. Simmer, covered, stirring occasionally, for 25 minutes or until potato is tender. Remove from heat. Stir in spinach.

Meanwhile, place 1fl cups water in a medium saucepan. Bring to the boil over high heat. Stir in rice. Cover and reduce heat to mediumlow. Simmer, for 13 minutes or until rice is just tender. Remove pan from heat. Stand, covered, for 5 minutes. Fluff up with a fork.
Cook dal according to packet instructions. Divide rice, curry and dal among bowls. Sprinkle with coriander leaves and serve.
